price: 149. Que vous montriez le bien que vous faites ou que vous le cachiez, ou bien que vous pardonniez un méfait, Allah est Indulgent et Omnipotent.
arabic: إِن تُبۡدُواْ خَيۡرًا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ أَوۡ تَعۡفُواْ عَن سُوٓءٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَفُوّٗا قَدِيرًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: in tub'dū khayran aw tukh'fūhu aw taʿfū ʿan sūin fa-inna al-laha kāna ʿafuwwan qadīran
